item.title: Your Christmas just got hotter: 5 raunchy Christmas movies to stream this holiday season! - Hindustan Times
item.description:
5 Raunchy Christmas Movies to Stream This Holiday Season

Date: Dec 25, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

This holiday season, spice up your movie-watching experience with five raunchy Christmas films that add a deliciously naughty twist to the festivities.

  • Hot Frosty: A lonely widow brings a handsome snowman to life, leading to unexpected romance.
  • The Merry Gentlemen: A big-city dancer aims to save her family‚Äôs theatre with a shirtless, Christmas-themed revue.
  • Our Little Secret: A woman navigates family drama when she encounters her ex during Christmas.
  • ‚ÄòTwas the Text Before Christmas: A spontaneous trip leads to unexpected friendships and a potential romance.
  • A Paris Christmas Waltz: An accountant and retired dancer find chemistry while competing in a Christmas dance competition.
‚ÄúGrab your cosy blanket, a box of chocolates, and settle in for a Christmas binge.‚Äù

These films promise to bring excitement and laughter to your holiday celebrations, making for a memorable and entertaining viewing experience.

item.title: Justin Baldoni's career is ‚Äòdead‚Äô as Blake Lively's filing is ‚Äòjust the start‚Äô of legal war: Report - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Blake Lively Accuses Justin Baldoni of Sexual Harassment: A Legal Battle Begins

Publication Date: December 25, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Blake Lively has filed a civil rights complaint against her co-star Justin Baldoni, accusing him of sexual harassment during the filming of 'It Ends With Us'. The legal actions mark the beginning of a significant legal feud, impacting Baldoni's career as allegations of a smear campaign arise.

  • Blake Lively files a complaint alleging sexual harassment against Justin Baldoni.
  • The complaint includes accusations of a retaliatory smear campaign orchestrated by Baldoni's PR firm.
  • Baldoni's career has taken a hit; he has lost representation from talent agency WME.
  • Legal expert predicts Lively could potentially win millions from the lawsuit.
  • The situation draws parallels to the Johnny Depp-Amber Heard legal battles.
  • Baldoni‚Äôs reputation is severely impacted, with increasing support for Lively from the film industry.
‚ÄúIt's absolutely reputation-related. She has, between her and her husband, all the money in the world.‚Äù - Attorney Camron Dowlatshahi

This case highlights serious allegations in the entertainment industry, with significant reputational implications and a potential long-lasting impact on Baldoni's career.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 20: Only 2% Drop On 3rd Tuesday, Allu Arjun Now Eyeing The 800 Crore Club! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 20: Only 2% Drop On 3rd Tuesday, Allu Arjun Now Eyeing The 800 Crore Club!

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Sukumar‚Äôs directorial Pushpa 2 is bringing cheer this Christmas season, with Allu Arjun's film continuing to perform well at the box office. The official figures for the third Tuesday collections have been released.

Maintains an outstanding hold!

The film earned 11.50 crores yesterday, showing minimal drop from 11.75 crores on day 19, with the total collection in the Hindi belt now at 715.75 crores.

Day-wise Box Office Breakdown:

  • Week 1: 433.50 crores (8-day extended week)
  • Week 2: 199 crores
  • Day 16: 12.50 crores
  • Day 17: 20.50 crores
  • Day 18: 27 crores
  • Day 19: 11.75 crores
  • Day 20: 11.50 crores

Total: 715.75 crores

Will it unlock the 800 crore milestone?

The film faces competition with the release of Baby John, which could affect its performance, but it is on track to potentially be the first Hindi film to reach the 800 crore mark.

Note: Box office numbers are based on estimates and have not been independently verified.

  • Suriya plays a character trying to leave behind a violent past while proposing to his love interest, played by Pooja Hegde.

item.title: Shraddha Kapoor had me beaten up for rejecting her proposal, says Varun Dhawan: ‚ÄòI regretted turning her down‚Äô - The Indian Express
item.description:
Varun Dhawan Recalls Childhood Encounter with Shraddha Kapoor Over Rejection

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

In a recent interaction, Varun Dhawan shared a humorous anecdote from his childhood involving Shraddha Kapoor. The two, who have been friends since they were children, experienced a memorable incident due to a rejected proposal.

  • Varun Dhawan and Shraddha Kapoor were childhood friends.
  • At age eight, Shraddha confessed her love to Varun, which he rejected.
  • In response, Shraddha had Varun beaten up at her tenth birthday party by her admirers.
  • Years later, Varun realized he regretted turning down Shraddha when he saw her as a teenager.
  • Varun and Shraddha have worked together in films like ABCD 2, Street Dancer 3D, and Stree 2.
‚ÄúIt was Shraddha‚Äôs tenth birthday party. She had invited me, and I was surrounded by guys who liked her. They started fighting with me. I was beaten up because I wasn‚Äôt accepting her proposal.‚Äù ‚Äì Varun Dhawan

This playful story highlights the lighthearted dynamics of their friendship and how childhood crushes can lead to unexpected outcomes.

item.title: Days after Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai were spotted together, good news for the actress as... - India.com
item.description:
Aishwarya Rai Receives Recognition from the Academy Amid Abhishek Bachchan Sightings

Publication Date: December 25, 2024 | Source: India.com

Following recent public sightings of Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai, which quelled divorce rumors, Aishwarya received another positive piece of news as she was featured by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences.

  • Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan recently appeared at their daughter Aaradhya's school function.
  • The Academy shared a picture from her film Jodha Akbar, announcing an exhibition featuring her wedding lehenga.
  • The exhibition is titled "COLOR IN MOTION" and highlights the craftsmanship of the lehenga designed by Neeta Lulla.
‚ÄúA lehenga fit for a queen, designed for the silver screen. Look closely and you‚Äôll spot a peacock, India‚Äôs national bird, made entirely of jewels.‚Äù

This recognition is another highlight in Aishwarya's illustrious career, showcasing Indian representation in global cinema.

item.title: Boney Kapoor admits he ‚Äògets attracted to females‚Äô, but Sridevi will always be the love of his life: ‚ÄòTill my dying day‚Ä¶‚Äô - The Indian Express
item.description:
Boney Kapoor admits he ‚Äògets attracted to females‚Äô, but Sridevi will always be the love of his life: ‚ÄòTill my dying day‚Ä¶‚Äô

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: The Indian Express

Film producer Boney Kapoor reflects on his everlasting love for his late wife, Sridevi, amidst his confessions about attraction towards other women.

  • Boney Kapoor expresses that Sridevi will always hold a special place in his heart, despite any attractions he may feel.
  • He speaks about the challenges and growth in relationships over time.
  • Boney highlights the depth of his love by stating he will always cherish Sridevi until his last breath.
‚ÄúWe were inseparable. I was in love with her, I am in love with her, and I will be in love with her till my dying day‚Ä¶‚Äù

This article sheds light on the profound bond Boney had with Sridevi and how he navigates feelings of attraction to others while keeping her memory alive.

item.title: Sridevi didn‚Äôt speak to Boney Kapoor for six months after he proposed: ‚ÄòYou‚Äôre married with two kids, how can you talk to me like this?‚Äô - The Indian Express
item.description:
Boney Kapoor Reflects on His Proposal to Sridevi and Their Relationship Journey

Date: December 2024

Source: The Indian Express

Boney Kapoor opens up about the difficult period surrounding his proposal to Sridevi, who initially rejected him due to his marriage and children. Despite this, they went on to marry, and Boney shares insights on the nature of long-term relationships.

  • Boney proposed to Sridevi while still married with children.
  • Sridevi did not speak to him for six months after the proposal.
  • Boney believes in transparency in relationships and advises honesty with partners and children.
  • He expresses enduring love for Sridevi, saying he will love her till his last breath.
‚ÄúUnderstanding between a couple should increase with every passing year. Lovey-dovey relationships without any differences don‚Äôt last long.‚Äù

Boney reflects on his journey with Sridevi and the challenges they faced, emphasizing the importance of honesty and transparency for lasting relationships.

item.title: REVEALED: Salman Khan features as Agent Bhai Jaan in a ROCKING cameo in Baby John - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Salman Khan Shines as Agent Bhai Jaan in Baby John Cameo

Publication Date: December 25, 2024 | Source: Bollywood Hungama

The highly anticipated film Baby John was released today, featuring a much-talked-about cameo by superstar Salman Khan as Agent Bhai Jaan, which is expected to delight fans.

  • The film has generated significant excitement with its mass appeal and star-studded cast.
  • Salman Khan's cameo adds a fun twist, showcasing both action and comedy.
  • This marks Salman‚Äôs second cameo appearance in two months, following his brief role in Singham Again.
  • Producer Murad Khetani revealed that Salman agreed to the cameo in under 10 seconds during their discussion.
  • Salman's birthday is just two days away, coinciding with the film‚Äôs release and a teaser for his upcoming film Sikandar.
‚ÄúAtlee informed me about the requirement for a star for a cameo... it took me an hour to gather the courage to ask him. Finally, I told him... He replied, ‚ÄòYes, done.‚Äô‚Äù - Murad Khetani

Salman Khan's cameo in Baby John promises to be a treat for fans, aligning with the festive spirit and drawing attention to his upcoming works.

The festive spirit was palpable as the family shared laughter and meals, embodying the essence of togetherness during the holiday season.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule worldwide box office collection Day 20: Allu Arjun film hunts down Baahubali 2, Dangal records; breaks Rs 1600 cr barrier - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule worldwide box office collection Day 20

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Indian Express

Director Sukumar‚Äôs blockbuster Telugu-language film, Pushpa 2: The Rule, has been on a record-breaking spree since its release last month, maintaining strong performance despite competition.

  • On its 20th day, Pushpa 2 collected Rs 14.2 crore in India.
  • The film surpassed Rs 700 crore in lifetime nett collections, becoming the highest-earning Hindi film ever.
  • Globally, Pushpa 2 has crossed the Rs 1600 crore mark.
  • It is now the third-biggest Indian film of all time, following Baahubali 2 and Dangal.
  • Most revenue has come from the Hindi version, with significant earnings from China.
  • The film's success has been overshadowed by a tragic incident during a screening.
"Pushpa 2 has now passed the Rs 1600 crore mark, making it the third-biggest Indian film of all time."

In conclusion, Pushpa 2's success at the box office is remarkable but is complicated by the controversies surrounding its screenings and the star's involvement in recent incidents.

item.description:
Is This Actress Limited to Minor Roles?

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Divi Vadthya gained significant popularity after her stint on the reality show Bigg Boss, but has struggled to secure impactful roles in Telugu cinema.

  • Divi Vadthya gained fame from Bigg Boss.
  • She had minor roles in films like Lambasingi and Godfather, neither of which were commercially successful.
  • Her role in the upcoming Pushpa 2 has been criticized for being too small.
  • There is a perception in Tollywood that Divi is limited to minor roles.
This has led to growing criticism in Tollywood circles that Divi Vadthya is suited only for minor roles.

The ongoing debate about Divi's career trajectory highlights the challenges faced by actresses in securing substantial roles in the film industry.

item.title: 3 Idiots turn 15: Omi Vaidya aka Chatur gave up role in How I Met Your Mother for audition of Aamir Khan film, was pranked by Rajkumar Hirani - The Indian Express
item.description:
Omi Vaidya Reflects on 15 Years of 3 Idiots

Date: November 30, 2023 | Source: Indian Express

Omi Vaidya, known for his role as Chatur in the iconic film '3 Idiots', shares his experiences on the film's 15th anniversary, discussing his early auditions and memorable moments from filming.

  • Vaidya recalls his surprise at the film's enduring popularity, stating, "Movies keep coming and going, but not with this one. I always knew it would be a good film, but never thought it would resonate with the audience 15 years later."
  • He initially had little interest in Indian cinema, having only seen a few Hindi films.
  • Vaidya chose to audition for '3 Idiots' after encouragement from a friend, despite focusing on his Hollywood career.
  • He had to turn down a role in 'How I Met Your Mother' for his '3 Idiots' audition.
  • Directorial pranks from Rajkumar Hirani made the filming experience memorable.
Omi Vaidya said, "I had to give up that very good call for HIMYM... I lost out on a lot of stuff here because of that."

Reflecting on his role and the impact of his character, Vaidya emphasizes the significance of the humor and genuine connections made on set. He appreciates the collaborative atmosphere fostered by Hirani and how Khan's involvement shaped the film's quality.

item.title: Pushpa 2 stampede case: Injured 8-year-old child Sri Teja responds after 20 days, father says 'Allu Arjun - DNA India
item.description:
Injured 8-Year-Old Responds After 20 Days Following Pushpa 2 Premiere Incident

Publication Date: December 25, 2024 | Source: DNA India

The 8-year-old boy injured in the Sandhya theatre incident during the premiere of Pushpa 2 in Hyderabad has finally responded after 20 days, providing hope to his family. His father, Bhaskar, expressed gratitude for the support received amidst this challenging time.

  • Injured during a stampede at the Pushpa 2 premiere in Hyderabad.
  • After 20 days in recovery, the child has started responding.
  • Allu Arjun attended the premiere and has been questioned by the police regarding the incident.
  • The producers offered financial support to the family.
  • Controversy surrounding safety permissions for the event.
‚ÄúThis is a very unfortunate incident. We have been deeply saddened since the day it happened.‚Äù - Producer Naveen Yerneni

The incident, resulting in tragedy, has sparked widespread political controversy, highlighting issues of safety at large public events.

item.title: Singham Again suddenly disappears from Amazon Prime Video ‚Äì What happened? - 123telugu
item.description:
Singham Again Disappears from Amazon Prime Video ‚Äì What Happened?

Published on Dec 25, 2024 | Source: 123telugu.com

Singham Again, the latest film in Rohit Shetty's cop universe, has unexpectedly been removed from Amazon Prime Video despite plans for it to become free-to-stream soon. The sudden disappearance has left fans in suspense as they await an explanation.

  • The film features a star-studded cast including Ajay Devgn, Akshay Kumar, and Salman Khan.
  • It was initially available for rent, with expectations of being available for free by December 29, 2024.
  • The reason for its removal remains unclear, prompting questions from the audience.
  • Produced by notable companies such as Reliance Entertainment and Jio Studios, the film is known for its high-octane action and a powerful soundtrack.
‚ÄúThe sudden disappearance remains unclear, and audiences are eagerly awaiting an official explanation from Amazon Prime Video.‚Äù

As fans await clarification, the situation highlights the unpredictability of content availability on streaming platforms.

item.title: Arbaaz Khan shares adorable pics with wife Sshura Khan on first wedding anniversary: ‚ÄòFeels like I‚Äôve known you forever' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Arbaaz Khan Celebrates First Wedding Anniversary with Sshura Khan

Date: Dec 25, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Bollywood actor Arbaaz Khan celebrated his first wedding anniversary with his wife, Sshura Khan, sharing heartfelt photos and messages on social media.

  • Arbaaz shared two beautiful pictures to commemorate their special day.
  • The couple's first photo features them dressed in elegant black outfits, while the second reflects their wedding day joy.
  • He expressed his love, stating, "Words can't express the happiness, joy and laughter you bring to our lives... it feels I've known you forever."
  • Sshura Khan also shared her gratitude, calling Arbaaz her "safe haven" and expressing her love for him.
  • The couple received congratulatory messages from fans and friends, celebrating their love.
‚ÄúHappy Anniversary Arbaazzz. My love, every day with you feels like a blessing.‚Äù - Sshura Khan

This celebration marks a joyful milestone for the couple, who married on December 24, 2023, after a year of dating.

item.title: Horoscope Today: Astrological prediction December 25, 2024 for all zodiac signs - India Today
item.description:
Daily Horoscope: Astrological Prediction for December 25, 2024

Published On: Dec 25, 2024

This daily horoscope provides insights into love, health, money, and career for all zodiac signs. Find predictions tailored to your Sun sign below.

  • Aries: Positive developments in business, stability in relationships, increased confidence. Lucky numbers: 7, 9. Lucky colour: Brown.
  • Taurus: Job performance aligns with expectations, caution in finances, effective communication. Lucky numbers: 5, 6, 7, 9. Lucky colour: Silver.
  • Gemini: Improvement in working conditions, boost from friends, increased focus on education. Lucky numbers: 5, 7. Lucky colour: Light Green.
  • Cancer: Focus on family harmony, patience in emotional matters, potential property acquisition. Lucky numbers: 2, 5, 7, 9. Lucky colour: Aqua.
  • Leo: Strength in business expansion, good news, and strong social relations. Lucky numbers: 1, 5, 7, 9. Lucky colour: Purple.
  • Virgo: Joy in family, growth in reputation, interest in conservation efforts. Lucky numbers: 5, 7, 8. Lucky colour: Dark Green.
  • Libra: Positive personal relationships, important decision-making, and heightened creativity. Lucky numbers: 5, 6, 7, 9. Lucky colour: Yellow.
  • Scorpio: Focus on budgets and expenses, trust your efforts for timely task completion. Lucky numbers: 7, 9. Lucky colour: Brown.
  • Sagittarius: Acceleration of financial tasks, reputation growth, strong support from friends. Lucky colour: 3, 7, 9.
  • Capricorn: Excellent relationships with authority, profitable career, and business endeavors. Lucky numbers: 5, 7, 8, 9. Lucky colour: Red.
  • Aquarius: Quick action on opportunities, increase in faith, and possible involvement in spiritual activities. Lucky numbers: 5, 7, 8, 9. Lucky colour: Purple.
  • Pisces: Focus on simplicity and balance, health considerations, cautious financial management. Lucky numbers: 3, 6, 7, 9. Lucky colour: Olive.
